trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The bouncy Loporrit would ask you to lend them an ear.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the bouncy Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_TODO_01<tab>Choose a flower.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the bouncy Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_000<tab>Just the person I was hoping to see! I'd like your thoughts on something, if you have a moment.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_001<tab>As you might have noticed, this park is rather drab as it is now, which is why I plan to plant flowers to liven things up a little.

TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_002<tab>Of course, there's no guarantee my tastes are in line with those of your people. We have a most wondrous assortment of plants at Lovingway's Darlings, and it would mean the moon to me if you picked which flowers we use here in the park.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_003<tab>Hooray! To the gardens, then! You're going to love them, I know it.

TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_010<tab>Well? What do you think? In my readings I found that even a single species of flower can bloom in a number of colors, which is what makes them so appealing. Though it took a little work, these three specimens are capable of the same.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_011<tab>They're all charming in their own way, but I couldn't possibly decide which is best for the park.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_012<tab>Which do you like best? Don't worry about giving a right or wrong answer─I trust your discerning eye!
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_013<tab>Any of these would look wonderful in the park, but which one do you like?
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_020<tab>Oh, this one's cute! I like how the flowers are all bunched together.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_021<tab>Good choice! It's so sparkly and pretty!
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_022<tab>Oooh, I like these, too! They're sure to make an impression with park visitors.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_SYSTEM_100_022<tab>Choose this flower?
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_100_022<tab>No need to rush in choosing, though I'd be lying if I said I'm not eager to hear your favorite.
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_023<tab>A fine choice! Now, let's take a few back to the park, shall we? Do be careful not to drop any on the way!
TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_030<tab>The flowers, if you please.

TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_031<tab>I'm told the people of Etheirys love nature, and flowers are held in particularly high regard. I realize they're not quite the same, but I sure hope these blooms make the moon feel a little more like home.

TEXT_AKTKZE012_04251_HAPPYLOPORRIT04251_000_032<tab>First things first─I need to plant as many of these flowers as I can! By the time I'm done, our gardens will be a place of joy and wonderment for all, you wait and see.
